sqlMap.select: select A.board_no as no, A.board_title as title, A.board_contents as contents, A.board_createdate as createdate, A.user_id as "writer.id", B.user_name as "writer.name", (select count(*) from tb_user_likes where board_no = a.board_no) as likes from tb_user_board A, tb_user B where A.user_id = B.user_id and board_active = 'Y' order by board_no desc

select A.board_no as no, A.board_title as title, A.board_contents as contents, A.board_createdate as createdate, A.user_id as "writer.id", B.user_name as "writer.name", (select count(*) from tb_user_likes where board_no = a.board_no) as likes from tb_user_board A, tb_user B where A.user_id = B.user_id and A.board_no = #value#
sqlMap.insert: insert into tb_user_board (board_no, board_title, board_contents, user_id) values(board_seq.nextval, #title#, #contents#, #writer.id#)
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from tb_user_likes where user_id = #userId# and board_no = #boardNo#
sqlMap.update: update tb_user_board set board_active = 'N' where board_no = #value#
